column5: Well im a newbie here, from Sudbury Ontario (well 10mins north actually). But im an avid fisherman and have been since I was smaller. I was just wondering who's dieng to get on the lakes, seem's like time is going soo slowww.. I just want may 2-4 and some nice pickeral and pike:)
Isn't there still lots of ice on the lakes up there?
yup, I am going crazy.  I even marked all the opener dates on my blackberry for FMZ 17...
Ya....I'm with ya man. Here is what Nipissing looked like today. A little open water starting.   Couple more weeks yet.
Yea still quite abit of ice so I hear, havent checked for myself. Weather needs to be hotter! Pike opens may 2nd?
Thanks Bernie!  Drooooooool,   Great shots to entice us!
Go hit the ice for some trout?

Well it would have to be a stocked lake as Lakers are, unfortunately, closed in Zone 11.  And Pike don't open 'till 3rd Saturday in May... unfortunately... it leaves me nothing to really fish for when I get to the cottage on the 10th of May.
if your from jsut north of sudz, (say cartier are) Zone 10 pike is open year round as of 08'

rainbows, splake are open yr round, pike open yr round wallies closed on the 31st in zone 10 zone 11 officially sucks now!!!   5 specks only one over 12.2 inches! rainbows splake perch and whities open yr round.
I Just want spring to roll up like its noones buisness so we can get the real fishing season started!! haha
No late winter angst for me.  Every season is fishing season.
Well I'd think that is just 'bout everyone here, myself included.  Welcome to OFC Don.
stay home and fish for pike and Walleye  TB
April has to be the worst month for fishing. Can't wait till most waters open up again like Kawarthas or upper tribs.
On the weekend I was practice casting to the corners of my pool. There's lotsa water on top of the cover. Got skunked.  JF
Are you kidding, I was getting the start of winter blues.  Diagnosis: fishing fever.  Prescription: Getting out on some open water.  Mike

We just got 3 inches of the white stuff yesterday, adn Michipicoten Bay (Superior) is still froze. The inland lakes still have a good 24 inches of solid ice...feels like an ice age this year.  I cant wait for Spring...oh wait...its here
